transcript: Champions are broken I was like huh he's like they people look at Champions and try and find something that that champion has that they don't have and he's like but it's not that at all he's like they lack something everyone else has which is an off button they just don't stop at the end of the day like if we're optimizing for outcomes then the most broken person will win the person who has the absolute biggest desire for achievement the absolute biggest fear or pain that they're running away from
